index.meta_title: ScanUp - #1 मुफ्त दस्तावेज़ स्कैनर | PDF में स्कैन करें
index.meta_description: ScanUp #1 मुफ्त दस्तावेज़ स्कैनर ऐप है। दस्तावेज़ों को PDF में स्कैन करें, डिजिटल हस्ताक्षर करें, OCR टेक्स्ट पहचान और तुरंत साझा करें। iOS और Android के लिए डाउनलोड करें। कोई वॉटरमार्क नहीं, असीमित स्कैन।
index.hero_description: Transform your smartphone into a powerful document scanner. Scan, sign, and share documents in seconds.
index.features_subtitle: Everything you need to scan, sign, and share documents professionally.
index.pricing_subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you need more.
index.see_how_it_works: देखें यह कैसे काम करता है
index.easy_sharing_desc: एक टैप से ईमेल, मैसेजिंग ऐप्स या क्लाउड स्टोरेज के माध्यम से दस्तावेज़ साझा करें।
index.web_dashboard_title: कहीं से भी अपने दस्तावेज़ों तक पहुंचें
index.web_dashboard_subtitle: ScanUp वेब डैशबोर्ड - किसी भी ब्राउज़र से अपने दस्तावेज़ प्रबंधित करें।
index.access_any_device_desc: कंप्यूटर, टैबलेट या किसी भी वेब ब्राउज़र से अपने स्कैन किए गए दस्तावेज़ देखें और प्रबंधित करें।
index.smart_folders_desc: रंगों के साथ कस्टम फोल्डर बनाएं और ड्रैग एंड ड्रॉप से दस्तावेज़ व्यवस्थित करें।
index.pdf_download_desc: अपने ब्राउज़र से तुरंत किसी भी दस्तावेज़ को पेशेवर PDF के रूप में डाउनलोड करें।
index.realtime_sync_desc: परिवर्तन आपके मोबाइल ऐप और वेब डैशबोर्ड के बीच तुरंत सिंक होते हैं।
index.google_signin_desc: अपने Google अकाउंट से त्वरित और सुरक्षित लॉगिन। कोई नया पासवर्ड याद नहीं रखना।
index.search_filter_desc: शक्तिशाली खोज और सॉर्टिंग विकल्पों के साथ किसी भी दस्तावेज़ को तुरंत खोजें।
index.swipe_hint: अधिक सुविधाएं देखने के लिए स्वाइप करें
index.dashboard_free_note: सभी उपयोगकर्ताओं के लिए मुफ्त • कोई डाउनलोड आवश्यक नहीं
index.how_it_works_subtitle: हमारी सहज स्कैनिंग प्रक्रिया के साथ सेकंड में कागज से डिजिटल में जाएं।
index.step1_desc: ऐप खोलें और अपने कैमरे को किसी भी दस्तावेज़ पर पॉइंट करें
index.step2_desc: हमारी AI किनारों का पता लगाती है और स्वचालित रूप से कैप्चर करती है
index.step3_desc: परिपूर्ण परिणामों के लिए फ़िल्टर और समायोजन लागू करें
index.step4_desc: PDF के रूप में एक्सपोर्ट करें और कहीं भी तुरंत शेयर करें
index.testimonials_title: दुनिया भर में लाखों लोगों द्वारा पसंद किया गया
index.testimonials_subtitle: देखें हमारे उपयोगकर्ता ScanUp के बारे में क्या कहते हैं।
index.faq_subtitle: ScanUp के बारे में वह सब कुछ जो आपको जानना चाहिए
index.faq_a1: हां! ScanUp असीमित स्कैन और बिना वॉटरमार्क वाला मुफ्त संस्करण प्रदान करता है। प्रीमियम सुविधाएं केवल €4.99/माह से उपलब्ध हैं।
index.faq_q2: ScanUp किन फ़ाइल फॉर्मेट को सपोर्ट करता है?
index.faq_a2: ScanUp एक्सपोर्ट के लिए PDF और JPEG फॉर्मेट सपोर्ट करता है। आप दस्तावेज़ स्कैन कर सकते हैं और उन्हें मल्टी-पेज PDF या उच्च-गुणवत्ता JPEG इमेज के रूप में एक्सपोर्ट कर सकते हैं।
index.faq_q3: क्या मैं कई पेज एक दस्तावेज़ में स्कैन कर सकता हूं?
index.faq_a3: बिल्कुल! ScanUp आपको कई पेज स्कैन करने और उन्हें एक PDF दस्तावेज़ में जोड़ने की अनुमति देता है।
index.faq_q4: क्या ScanUp ऑफलाइन काम करता है?
index.faq_a4: हां, ScanUp पूरी तरह से ऑफलाइन काम करता है! आप इंटरनेट कनेक्शन के बिना दस्तावेज़ स्कैन, एडिट, व्यवस्थित और एक्सपोर्ट कर सकते हैं।
index.faq_q5: क्या मेरा डेटा ScanUp के साथ सुरक्षित है?
index.faq_a5: आपकी गोपनीयता हमारी सर्वोच्च प्राथमिकता है। ScanUp आपके दस्तावेज़ों की सुरक्षा के लिए उद्योग-मानक एन्क्रिप्शन का उपयोग करता है।
index.faq_q6: क्या मैं दस्तावेज़ों में डिजिटल हस्ताक्षर जोड़ सकता हूं?
index.faq_a6: हां! ScanUp में एक शक्तिशाली डिजिटल हस्ताक्षर सुविधा शामिल है। आप अपनी उंगली से हस्ताक्षर बना सकते हैं, कई हस्ताक्षर सहेज सकते हैं और उन्हें किसी भी दस्तावेज़ में जोड़ सकते हैं।
index.faq_q7: क्या ScanUp में OCR (टेक्स्ट रिकॉग्निशन) है?
index.faq_a7: हां, ScanUp में AI-संचालित उन्नत OCR तकनीक शामिल है। यह 50 से अधिक भाषाओं में स्कैन किए गए दस्तावेज़ों से टेक्स्ट पहचान और निकाल सकता है।
index.faq_q8: ScanUp किन डिवाइसों पर उपलब्ध है?
index.faq_a8: ScanUp iOS (iPhone और iPad) और Android दोनों डिवाइसों पर उपलब्ध है।
index.download_cta_title: पेपरलेस जाने के लिए तैयार हैं?
index.download_cta_subtitle: अभी ScanUp डाउनलोड करें और दस्तावेज़ों को संभालने का तरीका बदलें। iOS और Android पर उपलब्ध।
index.footer_tagline: दस्तावेज़ों को स्कैन, साइन और शेयर करने का सबसे स्मार्ट तरीका। iOS और Android पर उपलब्ध।
index.og_title: ScanUp - अपने फोन से तुरंत दस्तावेज़ स्कैन करें
index.og_description: अपने स्मार्टफोन को एक शक्तिशाली दस्तावेज़ स्कैनर में बदलें। सेकंड में दस्तावेज़ स्कैन करें, साइन करें और साझा करें। iOS और Android के लिए मुफ्त।

features.meta_description: Discover ScanUp's powerful features: AI edge detection, smart filters, digital signatures, cloud backup, and more.
features.hero_subtitle: Everything you need to scan, sign, and share documents professionally.
features.ai_detection_desc: Our advanced AI automatically detects document edges and adjusts perspective for perfect scans every time.
features.filters_desc: Enhance your scans with professional-grade filters designed for different document types.
features.signatures_desc: Create, save, and apply your signature to any document with just a few taps.
features.cloud_desc: Never lose your documents. Automatic cloud sync keeps everything safe and accessible.
features.web_desc: Access and manage your documents from any browser with our powerful web interface.
features.security_desc: Your documents are protected with enterprise-grade security measures.
features.cta_subtitle: Download ScanUp today and transform how you handle documents.

pricing.meta_description: ScanUp pricing plans. Start free, upgrade to Pro for unlimited scans, or get Lifetime access.
pricing.hero_subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you need more power.
pricing.faq_q1: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
pricing.faq_a1: Yes! You can cancel your Pro subscription at any time. You'll retain access until the end of your billing period.
pricing.faq_q2: Is there a free trial for Pro?
pricing.faq_a2: Yes, Pro comes with a 7-day free trial. You won't be charged until the trial ends.
pricing.faq_q3: What happens to my documents if I downgrade?
pricing.faq_a3: Your documents remain safe. You can still access them, but cloud sync will pause and some features will be limited.

faq.meta_title: FAQ - ScanUp Document Scanner | Frequently Asked Questions
faq.meta_description: Find answers to common questions about ScanUp document scanner app. Learn about features, pricing, offline mode, OCR, digital signatures, and more.
faq.hero_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about ScanUp. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.
faq.gs_q1: How do I scan my first document?
faq.gs_a1: Open the ScanUp app and tap the camera button at the bottom. Point your camera at the document - our AI will automatically detect the edges. Once captured, you can adjust the crop, apply filters, and save as PDF.
faq.gs_q2: Is ScanUp available on both iOS and Android?
faq.gs_a2: Yes! ScanUp is available on both the Apple App Store and Google Play Store. The app works identically on both platforms, and your documents sync across all your devices.
faq.gs_q3: Do I need an account to use ScanUp?
faq.gs_a3: You can use basic scanning features without an account. However, creating a free account enables cloud backup, cross-device sync, and access to the web dashboard.
faq.feat_q1: How does auto edge detection work?
faq.feat_a1: Our AI-powered edge detection uses computer vision to identify document boundaries automatically. It works on any background and can detect documents at various angles.
faq.feat_q2: Can I add digital signatures to documents?
faq.feat_a2: Yes! Premium users can create and save multiple signatures. Draw your signature once, then apply it to any document with a single tap. Signatures are stored securely on your device.
faq.feat_a3: You can export documents as PDF (recommended for sharing), JPEG, or PNG. Multi-page documents are automatically combined into a single PDF file.
faq.wd_a1: The Web Dashboard lets you access and manage your scanned documents from any web browser. You can view, organize into folders, rename, download as PDF, and delete documents - all from your computer.
faq.wd_q2: How do I access the Web Dashboard?
faq.wd_a2: Visit scanup.app/dashboard and sign in with your account. You can use email/password or Google Sign-In. Your documents will sync automatically.
faq.wd_q3: Can I create folders on the web?
faq.wd_a3: Yes! You can create custom folders with different colors to organize your documents. Simply drag and drop documents into folders, or use the 'Move to Folder' button.
faq.wd_q4: Do changes on web sync to my phone?
faq.wd_a4: Absolutely! All changes sync in real-time. Rename a document on the web, and it updates on your phone. Create a folder on your phone, and it appears on the web dashboard.
faq.sub_q1: What's included in the free version?
faq.sub_a1: Free users get 10 scans per month, basic filters, PDF export (with watermark), and local storage. It's perfect for occasional scanning needs.
faq.sub_a2: Pro ($4.99/month) includes unlimited scans, all premium filters, digital signatures, cloud backup, no watermarks, OCR text recognition, and priority support.
faq.sub_q3: Is there a lifetime purchase option?
faq.sub_a3: Yes! For $49.99 one-time, you get all Pro features forever with lifetime updates. It's the best value if you plan to use ScanUp long-term.
faq.sub_q4: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.sub_a4: Subscriptions are managed through the App Store (iOS) or Google Play (Android). Go to your device's subscription settings to cancel. You'll retain access until the end of your billing period.
faq.sec_a1: Yes! All data is encrypted using AES-256 at rest and TLS/SSL in transit. We follow industry best practices and use SOC 2 compliant cloud infrastructure.
faq.sec_a2: Premium users can add password protection to individual documents or folders. The password is required to view or export the document.
faq.sec_a3: Never. We do not sell, share, or monetize your personal data or documents. Your documents are yours alone. Read our Privacy Policy for full details.
faq.contact_subtitle: Our support team is ready to help you with any questions or issues.

reviews.meta_description: Read what thousands of users say about ScanUp. Real reviews from real users.
reviews.hero_subtitle: Join thousands of happy users who trust ScanUp for their document scanning needs.
reviews.review_1_text: The best document scanner I've ever used. The AI edge detection is incredibly accurate and saves me so much time.
reviews.review_2_text: Finally, a scanner app that actually works offline! Perfect for scanning documents during site visits.
reviews.review_3_text: Love the web dashboard. I can access all my scanned documents from my computer without any hassle.
reviews.review_4_text: The digital signature feature is a game-changer. I sign contracts on the go now.
reviews.review_5_text: Clean interface, fast scanning, and reliable cloud sync. Everything I need in a scanner app.
reviews.review_6_text: Great value for money. The lifetime deal was perfect for my needs.
reviews.cta_subtitle: Download ScanUp today and see why thousands of users trust us.

privacy.meta_title: Privacy Policy - ScanUp | Your Data Protection
privacy.meta_description: Learn how ScanUp protects your privacy and personal data. GDPR compliant privacy policy.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: ScanUp - Secure Document Scanner
privacy.intro: At Vision Go GmbH ('Company', 'we', 'our'), we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data.
privacy.matters_text: We believe in transparency and give you control over your data.
privacy.not_collect_1: We do NOT read or analyze the content of your scanned documents
privacy.not_collect_2: We do NOT sell your personal data to third parties
privacy.not_collect_3: We do NOT track your location
privacy.not_collect_4: We do NOT access your contacts, photos (except camera for scanning) or other personal files
privacy.use_intro: We use the collected information to:
privacy.use_provide_desc: Enable document scanning, storage, and synchronization
privacy.use_accounts_desc: Create and maintain your user account
privacy.use_notify_desc: Alert you about web access requests and important updates
privacy.use_improve_desc: Analyze usage patterns to improve the app
privacy.use_support_desc: Respond to your inquiries and resolve issues
privacy.use_security_desc: Protect against fraud and unauthorized access

terms.meta_title: Terms of Service - ScanUp | User Agreement
terms.meta_description: Read ScanUp's Terms of Service. Understand your rights and responsibilities when using our document scanner app.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: ScanUp - Secure Document Scanner
terms.intro: Welcome to ScanUp! These Terms of Service govern your access to and use of the ScanUp mobile application.
terms.important_text: By downloading, installing, or using ScanUp, you agree to these Terms.
terms.section_1_intro: By accessing or using ScanUp, you confirm that:
terms.accept_1: You are at least 16 years old
terms.accept_2: You have read and accept these terms
terms.accept_3: You have the legal capacity to enter into binding agreements
terms.section_2_intro: ScanUp is a mobile document scanning application that allows you to:
terms.service_1: Scan physical documents using your device camera
terms.service_2: Convert scans to PDF or image format
terms.service_4: Securely store documents on your device
terms.service_6: Extract text using OCR technology (Premium feature)
terms.account_1: You must provide accurate and complete information
terms.account_2: You are responsible for maintaining your account security
terms.account_3: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
terms.account_4: You may not share your account with others
terms.acceptable_1: Use the service for illegal purposes
terms.acceptable_3: Attempt unauthorized access to our systems
terms.acceptable_4: Infringe on others' intellectual property rights
terms.premium_1: Are billed through Apple App Store or Google Play
terms.premium_3: Can be cancelled anytime through your app store settings
terms.ip_text: All rights, titles, and interests in ScanUp belong to Vision Go GmbH. You retain all rights to the content you create.
terms.liability_text: ScanUp is provided 'as is'. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
terms.changes_text: We may update these terms. We will notify you of material changes via email or in-app notification.

cookies.meta_title: Cookie Policy - ScanUp | How We Use Cookies
cookies.meta_description: Learn how ScanUp uses cookies to improve your experience. Manage your cookie preferences.
cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.what_text: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our services.
cookies.essential_text: These cookies are necessary for the website to function. They include:
cookies.analytics_text: We use analytics to improve our services. These cookies help us understand:
cookies.manage_text: You can control cookies through your browser settings:
cookies.manage_1: Chrome: Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies
cookies.disable_warning: Note: Disabling essential cookies may affect website functionality.
cookies.third_party_text: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies:
cookies.updates_text: We may update this Cookie Policy periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

gdpr.meta_title: GDPR Compliance - ScanUp | Your Data Protection Rights
gdpr.meta_description: Learn about your GDPR rights and how ScanUp protects your personal data under European data protection law.
gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.subtitle: Your data protection rights under the General Data Protection Regulation
gdpr.commitment_text: ScanUp is committed to protecting your privacy and complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This page explains your rights and how we process your personal data.
gdpr.rights_intro: As an EU resident, you have the following rights:
gdpr.right_access_desc: Request a copy of your personal data
gdpr.right_portability_desc: Receive your data in a portable format
gdpr.right_restriction_desc: Limit how we use your data
gdpr.legal_basis_intro: We process your personal data under the following legal bases:
gdpr.legal_basis_1: Contract performance: to provide our services
gdpr.legal_basis_3: Legitimate interest: for service improvement and security
gdpr.legal_basis_4: Legal obligation: to comply with applicable laws
gdpr.retention_intro: We retain your data while your account is active. Upon account deletion:
gdpr.retention_1: Account data is deleted within 30 days
gdpr.retention_3: Anonymized logs may be kept for analytics
gdpr.transfers_intro: Data may be processed in countries outside the EU. We ensure appropriate safeguards through:
gdpr.exercise_intro: To exercise any of your GDPR rights, contact our Data Protection Officer:
gdpr.complaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.

auth.access_docs: कहीं से भी अपने दस्तावेज़ एक्सेस करें
